mapper.sql: select sd.* from sys_dept sd where sd.deleted = 0 order by sd.sort, sd.created_time desc
mapper.select:
select sd.id, sd.name, sd.parent_id parentId, sd.sort, sd.status, sd.created_time createdTime from sys_dept sd where sd.deleted = 0
and sd.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and sd.status = #{status}
order by sd.sort, sd.created_time desc
select sd.id value, sd.name label, sd.parent_id parentId from sys_dept sd where sd.deleted = 0 order by sd.sort, sd.created_time desc
